meanings.definition: Lack of respect or courtesy towards others.
meanings.sent1: His disrespectfulness towards his elders was unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: Her constant disrespectfulness towards her classmates made them feel sad.
meanings.sent3: The disrespectfulness of the dog towards the cat was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The disrespectfulness of the storm towards the fragile flowers was evident in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The teacher addressed the disrespectfulness in the classroom with a firm tone.

meanings.sent4: The disrespectfulness of the wind tearing through the garden was shocking.
meanings.sent5: The principal addressed the disrespectfulness in the school with a new policy.
